name: Squares: A Game about Matching Colors
name_original: Squares: A Game about Matching Colors
description:
From the creators of Pop the Lock, our new game Squares!

Squares is a simple match game.

Paint the board with blocks. Place three blocks of the same color next to each other to match!

The higher you score, the more colors appear. Will you make it to the seventh color?

“Squares is the best game.”
“Squares changed my life, and my dog’s life too”
“Now all I can see is Squares”

These are real reactions, from real people, on the Internet.

Now get playing and try to beat our score. It’s 2,912!
